content: Created `pyproject.toml` with a src-layout setuptools build configuration, core/runtime dependencies for the experiments modules, and standardized dev tooling settings for Black, Ruff, and Pytest.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json, textwrap, os, re, sys

from pathlib import Path
import json
target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = []

chunks.append("""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=68", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta\""")

chunks.append("""[project]
name = "generated_script_1766542734624"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Reusable experiments sweep I/O, plotting, and execution utilities."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "OpenAI", email = "noreply@openai.com"}]
dependencies = [
  "numpy>=1.23",
  "pandas>=2.0",
  "pyyaml>=6.0",
  "matplotlib>=3.7",
]""")

chunks.append("""[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
  "pytest>=7.4",
  "pytest-cov>=4.1",
  "ruff>=0.1.6",
  "black>=23.11",
]""")

chunks.append("""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = {"" = "src"}

[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["src"]""")

chunks.append("""[tool.black]
line-length = 100
target-version = ["py310"]
include = "\\.pyi?$"
skip-string-normalization = false""")

chunks.append("""[tool.ruff]
line-length = 100
target-version = "py310"
src = ["src", "tests"]
fix = false

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP", "SIM"]
ignore = ["E501"]

[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
known-first-party = ["experiments"]""")

chunks.append("""[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "7.0"
addopts = "-q --strict-markers --strict-config --disable-warnings"
testpaths = ["tests"]
pythonpath = ["src"]""")

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

from pathlib import Path
import json
target_path = Path('/mnt/data')/'pyproject.toml'
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=68", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta"
""",
"""[project]
name = "generated_script_1766542734624"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Reusable experiments sweep I/O, plotting, and execution utilities."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = { text = "MIT" }
authors = [{ name = "OpenAI", email = "noreply@openai.com" }]
dependencies = [
  "numpy>=1.23",
  "pandas>=2.0",
  "pyyaml>=6.0",
  "matplotlib>=3.7",
]
""",
"""[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = [
  "pytest>=7.4",
  "pytest-cov>=4.1",
  "ruff>=0.1.6",
  "black>=23.11",
]
""",
"""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = { "" = "src" }

[tool.setuptools.packages.find]
where = ["src"]
""",
"""[tool.black]
line-length = 100
target-version = ["py310"]
include = "\\\\.pyi?$"
""",
"""[tool.ruff]
line-length = 100
target-version = "py310"
src = ["src", "tests"]
fix = false

[tool.ruff.lint]
select = ["E", "F", "I", "B", "UP", "SIM"]
ignore = ["E501"]

[tool.ruff.lint.isort]
known-first-party = ["experiments"]
""",
"""[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "7.0"
addopts = "-q --strict-markers --strict-config --disable-warnings"
testpaths = ["tests"]
pythonpath = ["src"]
""",
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created `pyproject.toml` with a src-layout setuptools build configuration, core/runtime dependencies for the experiments modules, and standardized dev tooling settings for Black, Ruff, and Pytest.
